borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition; excavation of the front and rear gardens including underneath the footprint of the dwellinghouse to form lightwells in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; erection of 2no dormer windows to replace 2no existing rooflights in the front roofslope; replacement of 1no rooflight with a new rooflight in the front gable roofslope; installation of 1no rooflight and 1no roof access hatch at main roof level, and 1no rooflight above the roof of first floor rear back addition; installation of French doors and a Juliet balcony to replace the existing rooflight in the rear roofslope; installation of French doors with side glazed panels and a Juliet balcony to replace the existing window to the rear elevation, and installation of 3no new windows to replace 2no existing windows to the side of rear back addition at first floor level; erection of a bin store at the front of the property; alterations to the front boundary wall to include erection of new brick wall with railings on top, new brick piers and installation of pedestrian access gate at the front elevation.
